languages.text: {n}Парень хмыкает и вместе с кровавой слюной сплевывает выбитый зуб.{/n} "Ты так и не понял{mf||а}. Немезит — это не конкретный человек. Это стихия мести и ярости, кипящая на нижних палубах узурпированного тобой корабля. Это служка, что чистит твой ночной горшок. Смотритель хранилища, чью семью забили блюстители. Машинист, которому за десяток смен выдали втрое меньше пайковых талонов. Это имя того, кто рано или поздно прикончит тебя. Тот, кто это сделает, и будет настоящим Немезитом".

{n}The rebel scoffs and spits out a tooth together with blood-streaked saliva.{/n} "You still haven't figured it out, have you? Nemesite is not any one person. It is the vengeance and rage simmering on the lower decks of your usurped ship. It is the servant who cleans your chamber pot, the storage keeper whose family was butchered by enforcers, the train driver who was given half a dozen ration cards in three times as many shifts. It is the name of the one who will kill you, sooner or later. Whoever accomplishes it will be the real Nemesite."
languages.original_text: {n}Парень хмыкает и вместе с кровавой слюной сплевывает выбитый зуб.{/n} "Ты так и не понял{mf||а}. Немезит — это не конкретный человек. Это стихия мести и ярости, кипящая на нижних палубах узурпированного тобой корабля. Это служка, что чистит твой ночной горшок. Смотритель хранилища, чью семью забили блюстители. Машинист, которому за десяток смен выдали втрое меньше пайковых талонов. Это имя того, кто рано или поздно прикончит тебя. Тот, кто это сделает, и будет настоящим Немезитом".

traits.locale_text: {n}The rebel snickers and spits out a knocked out tooth together with bloody saliva.{/n} "You still have not figured it out, have you. Nemesite is not a specific person. It is the vengeance and rage simmering in the lower decks of your usurped ship. It's the servant who cleans your chamber pot, the vault keeper whose family was butchered by enforcers, the machinist who was given half as many ration coupons in a dozen shifts. It is the name of someone who will kill you sooner or later. Whoever does it will be the real Nemesite."

{n}The rebel snickers and spits out a knocked out tooth together with bloody saliva.{/n} "You still have not figured it out, have you. Nemesite is not a specific person. It's the servant who cleans your chamber pot, the vault keeper whose family was butchered by enforcers, the machinist who was given half as many ration coupons in a dozen shifts. It is the name of someone who will kill you sooner or later. Whoever does it will be the real Nemesite."

It is the vengeance and rage simmering in the lower decks of your usurped ship. It is the servant who cleans your chamber pot, the vault keeper whose family was butchered by enforcers, the machinist who was given half a dozen ration coupons in twice as many shifts. It is the name of the one who will kill you, sooner or later. Whoever accomplishes it will be the real Nemesite."

It is the vengeance and rage simmering on the lower decks of your usurped ship. It is the servant who cleans your chamber pot, the storage keeper whose family was butchered by enforcers, the train driver who was given half a dozen ration cards in three times as many shifts. It is the name of the one who will kill you, sooner or later. Whoever accomplishes it will be the real Nemesite."

languages.text: {n}Der Rebell schnaubt und spuckt einen Zahn und blutigen Speichel aus.{/n} "Ihr habt es immer noch nicht durchschaut, oder? Nemesit ist keine Person. Er ist die Rache und der Zorn, die auf den Unterdecks Eures usurpierten Schiffes brodeln. Er ist der Diener, der Euren Nachttopf reinigt, der Lagerarbeiter, dessen Familie von Enforcern getötet wurde, der Lokführer, der ein halbes Dutzend Rationenkarten für dreimal so viele Schichten erhalten hat. Er ist der Mann, der Euch früher oder später töten wird. Wer auch immer das tut, wird der wahre Nemesit sein."
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel scoffs and spits out a tooth together with blood-streaked saliva.{/n} "You still haven't figured it out, have you? Nemesite is not any one person. It is the vengeance and rage simmering on the lower decks of your usurped ship. It is the servant who cleans your chamber pot, the storage keeper whose family was butchered by enforcers, the train driver who was given half a dozen ration cards in three times as many shifts. It is the name of the one who will kill you, sooner or later. Whoever accomplishes it will be the real Nemesite."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rebell schnaubt und spuckt einen Zahn und blutigen Speichel aus.{/n} {/n}"Ihr habt es immer noch nicht durchschaut, oder? Nemesit ist keine Person. Er ist die Rache und der Zorn, die auf den Unterdecks Eures usurpierten Schiffes brodeln. Er ist der Diener, der Euren Nachttopf reinigt, der Lagerarbeiter, dessen Familie von Enforcern getötet wurde, der Lokführer, der ein halbes Dutzend Rationenkarten für dreimal so viele Schichten erhalten hat. Er ist der Mann, der Euch früher oder später töten wird. Wer auch immer das tut, wird der wahre Nemesit sein."

languages.text: {n}El rebelde suelta una risa burlona y escupe un diente ensangrentado.{/n} «Aún no lo entiendes, ¿no? Nemesitio no es una persona concreta. Es la venganza y la furia que crece en las cubiertas inferiores de tu nave usurpada. Es el sirviente que limpia tu orinal, el trabajador de almacén a cuya familia masacraron los guardias, el conductor de tren que no recibió más de cinco tarjetas de racionamiento en quince turnos. Es el nombre de quien acabará contigo, tarde o temprano. Quien lo consiga será el auténtico Nemesitio».
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel scoffs and spits out a tooth together with blood-streaked saliva.{/n} "You still haven't figured it out, have you? Nemesite is not any one person. It is the vengeance and rage simmering on the lower decks of your usurped ship. It is the servant who cleans your chamber pot, the storage keeper whose family was butchered by enforcers, the train driver who was given half a dozen ration cards in three times as many shifts. It is the name of the one who will kill you, sooner or later. Whoever accomplishes it will be the real Nemesite."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rebelde suelta una risa burlona y escupe un diente ensangrentado.{/n} «Aún no lo entiendes, ¿no? Nemesitio no es una persona concreta. Es la venganza y la furia que crece en las cubiertas inferiores de tu nave usurpada. Es el sirviente que limpia tu orinal, el trabajador de almacén a cuya familia masacraron los guardias, el conductor de tren que no recibió más de cinco tarjetas de racionamiento en quince turnos. Es el nombre de quien acabará contigo, tarde o temprano. Quien lo consiga será el auténtico Nemesitio».

languages.text: {n}反乱者はせせら笑い、血の混じった唾液と共に歯を吐き捨てる。{/n}「まだわからないか？ネメサイトは、ひとりの人間ではない。奪われたお前の船の下位デッキで煮えたぎる復讐心と怒りを持つ者達だ。それは、お前の部屋の便器を掃除する使用人だったり、エンフォーサーに家族を虐殺された倉庫番だったり、3倍のシフトで半ダースの配給カードを与えられた列車の運転手だったりと様々。それは、そのうちお前に手をかける者の名前だよ。それを成し遂げる者が真のネメサイトとなるんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel scoffs and spits out a tooth together with blood-streaked saliva.{/n} "You still haven't figured it out, have you? Nemesite is not any one person. It is the vengeance and rage simmering on the lower decks of your usurped ship. It is the servant who cleans your chamber pot, the storage keeper whose family was butchered by enforcers, the train driver who was given half a dozen ration cards in three times as many shifts. It is the name of the one who will kill you, sooner or later. Whoever accomplishes it will be the real Nemesite."

traits.locale_text: {n}反乱者はせせら笑い、血の混じった唾液と共に歯を吐き捨てる。{/n}「まだわからないか？ネメサイトは、ひとりの人間ではない。奪われたお前の船の下位デッキで煮えたぎる復讐心と怒りを持つ者達だ。それは、お前の部屋の便器を掃除する使用人だったり、エンフォーサーに家族を虐殺された倉庫番だったり、3倍のシフトで半ダースの配給カードを与えられた列車の運転手だったりと様々。それは、そのうちお前に手をかける者の名前だよ。それを成し遂げる者が真のネメサイトとなるんだ」

languages.text: {n}眼前的叛乱分子嘲笑着，吐出一颗牙齿和血迹斑斑的唾沫。{/n}“看来你还是没弄明白，是吧？涅墨斯特并不是某个特定的人。在这艘遭到篡夺的船上，他是底层甲板复仇与愤怒的化身。他是为你清洗便桶的仆人，是家人惨遭执法者屠杀的仓库管理员，是干了三个人的活却只能拿到六张配给卡的列车司机。这个名字属于那个迟早会杀死你的人，谁能杀死你，谁就是真正的涅墨斯特。”
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel scoffs and spits out a tooth together with blood-streaked saliva.{/n} "You still haven't figured it out, have you? Nemesite is not any one person. It is the vengeance and rage simmering on the lower decks of your usurped ship. It is the servant who cleans your chamber pot, the storage keeper whose family was butchered by enforcers, the train driver who was given half a dozen ration cards in three times as many shifts. It is the name of the one who will kill you, sooner or later. Whoever accomplishes it will be the real Nemesite."

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的叛乱分子嘲笑着，吐出一颗牙齿和血迹斑斑的唾沫。{/n}“看来你还是没弄明白，是吧？涅墨斯特并不是某个特定的人。在这艘遭到篡夺的船上，他是底层甲板复仇与愤怒的化身。他是为你清洗便桶的仆人，是家人惨遭执法者屠杀的仓库管理员，是干了三个人的活却只能拿到六张配给卡的列车司机。这个名字属于那个迟早会杀死你的人，谁能杀死你，谁就是真正的涅墨斯特。”

languages.text: {n}Le rebelle ricane, puis crache une dent couverte de salive sanguinolente.{/n} « Vous n'avez toujours pas compris ? Némésite n'est pas un unique individu. C'est la vengeance et la rage qui couvent sur les ponts inférieurs de votre vaisseau usurpé. C'est le serviteur qui nettoie votre pot de chambre, le gardien de l'entrepôt dont la famille a été massacrée par les prévôts, le conducteur de train qui a reçu une demi-douzaine de cartes de rationnement pour trois fois plus de périodes de quart. C'est le nom de celui qui vous tuera tôt ou tard. Celui qui accomplira ce geste, et celui-là seulement, sera le vrai Némésite. »
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel scoffs and spits out a tooth together with blood-streaked saliva.{/n} "You still haven't figured it out, have you? Nemesite is not any one person. It is the vengeance and rage simmering on the lower decks of your usurped ship. It is the servant who cleans your chamber pot, the storage keeper whose family was butchered by enforcers, the train driver who was given half a dozen ration cards in three times as many shifts. It is the name of the one who will kill you, sooner or later. Whoever accomplishes it will be the real Nemesite."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rebelle ricane, puis crache une dent couverte de salive sanguinolente.{/n} « Vous n'avez toujours pas compris ? Némésite n'est pas un unique individu. C'est la vengeance et la rage qui couvent sur les ponts inférieurs de votre vaisseau usurpé. C'est le serviteur qui nettoie votre pot de chambre, le gardien de l'entrepôt dont la famille a été massacrée par les prévôts, le conducteur de train qui a reçu une demi-douzaine de cartes de rationnement pour trois fois plus de périodes de quart. C'est le nom de celui qui vous tuera tôt ou tard. Celui qui accomplira ce geste, et celui-là seulement, sera le vrai Némésite. »

languages.text: {n}İsyancı, gülerek kanla karışık salyasıyla birlikte bir dişini tükürüyor.{/n} "Hâlâ çözemedin, değil mi? Nemezit, tek bir kişi değil. Nemezit, zapt ettiğin geminin alt güvertelerinde kaynayan intikam ve öfkenin ta kendisidir. Lazımlığını temizleyen hizmetkâr, infazcılar tarafından tüm ailesi katledilen depo görevlisi, üç kat fazla vardiyada çalışıp eline altı tane kumanya kartı geçen makinisttir. Eninde sonunda seni öldürecek olanın adıdır. Bunu her kim başarırsa hakiki Nemezit o olacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel scoffs and spits out a tooth together with blood-streaked saliva.{/n} "You still haven't figured it out, have you? Nemesite is not any one person. It is the vengeance and rage simmering on the lower decks of your usurped ship. It is the servant who cleans your chamber pot, the storage keeper whose family was butchered by enforcers, the train driver who was given half a dozen ration cards in three times as many shifts. It is the name of the one who will kill you, sooner or later. Whoever accomplishes it will be the real Nemesite."
